text.data: Dragonkeeper: Here I am! You shouldn't keep the dragons starving![end]
Chapter 2 The Legend we Dreamed of...[end]
Chapter 20 The Sky of Sadness[end]
Rush: It's the start of a new battle! Matelite has some big, important announcement. Didn't we all have to line up like this once before?[end]

Rush: Matelite says he's gonna teach us the basics of fighting.
He thinks he's such a big shot, yelling at us to line up and wait like that...[end]

Taicho: Quiet down!
Be quiet and listen to Matelite's speech![end]
Palpaleos: Matelite has something to say. I would like you to listen.[end]
Rush: Matelite's speech is long. Will you do the quick version?[end]
Yes No[end1]
Matelite: Whenever I'm in front of everyone I get really nervous... This won't do... Do it just like I practiced...[end]
Matelite: You all are probably very exhausted, so... to put it briefly...[end]
Matelite: Our fight has only just begun! Okay, everybody![end]
Matelite: As you know, Sendak has fainted. He's not dead yet, but he probably doesn't have long to live...[end]
Here is Sendak's will! He hasn't died yet, but I'll read it anyway![end]
ME![end]
[0x2a]gasp[0x2a] [0x2a]gasp[0x2a][end]

We are raising a flag in opposition to the Granbelos Empire!
We are the freedom force that will save all the lagoons of our world of Orelus from the rule of the Empire![end]

However... At the beginning, we will be called a humble resistance group...
To not forget that, I shall call us the Resistance, not the Freedom Force![end]
Matelite: It says, [0x24]I hereby make [character][0x0] acting captain after I pass away...[0x22]!![end]
Okay, everyone!! The first thing we need are rules and orders for the unit![end]

Since it'll be boring around here after he dies...
We will respect Sendak's dying wish and make [character][0x0] acting captain![end]
However... It seems there are people who don't understand![end]
[character][0x0]! Do your best as the new captain![end]
First, I will have to show you what rules and orders are![end]
The one who will command the Resistance is...[end]
No matter what you say... I am Matelite of Kahna![end]
I have no equal when it comes to fighting![end]
If I'm going to be the one who takes command of the battle, then the captain of [character][0x9], Kahna's... No... the Resistance's flagship will be...[end]
But then there's also the possibility he's just faking it, that he was exhausted in battle! We'll have Captain Sendak help out in the next battle, so don't worry![end]
Master Sendak!![end]
You handle the controls! You, over there![end]
Respond![end]
Hornet: Quiet![end]
Hornet: Tell me when to make [character][0x9] leave![end]
And tell me where to go too![end]
Matelite: Taicho... What do you want?[end]
Taicho: I am Taicho, which makes me the squad captain![end]
Matelite: Taicho is the squad captain![end]
Matelite: Okay, everybody! From now on follow the rules![end]
We're going to practice now! Do what I say! Okay, here we go![end]
Turn right! [0xfc][0x10][0x28]Press right![0x29][end1]
Okay, General Palpaleos! We're counting on you![end]
[0x2a]wheeze[0x2a][end]
Face straight! [0xfc][0x10][0x28]Press up![0x29][end1]
Turn left! [0xfc][0x10][0x28]Press left![0x29][end1]

Palpaleos: So this is the chief member of the Resistance...
[0x28]I must blend in quickly...[0x29][end]

[character][0x0]... You will soon become an excellent knight just like me...
[character][0x1] is now of marriageable age... Don't disappoint me...[end]

......
Zzzz... Zzzz...
[character][0x1]...... [0x2a]mumble[0x2a] [0x2a]mumble[0x2a] ......[end]
Sendak: [character][0x0]... There is something I wish to talk to you about... Come to the captain's room later...[end]
Uh oh... Formation and dragons... I'm not good with either of them...[end]
Sir Matelite practiced all night without sleeping... Leave him be...[end]
Taicho: Nobody likes me. Matelite demoted me to number three...[end]
Rush: Matelite looks like he's mad. Is this a foreshadow of things to come...?[end]
Rush: Don't jump out just because the practice didn't go well![end]
Rush: Acting captain... Way to go, [character][0x0]![end]
Truce: We're waiting for Matelite. Get in line.[end]
Truce: Hmm... balance is an important part of Formation...[end]
Truce: The enemy's floating fortress, Trafalgar, is the Empire's ultimate weapon! Emperor Sauzer must not have allowed its use in the previous battles...[end]
Bikkebakke: Umm... Are we going to start soon or not?[end]
Bikkebakke: Umm... How long are we going to be doing this?[end]

[0x28]Bikkebakke is absorbed in reading a difficult book.[0x29]
[0x28]The cover of the book says, [0x24]The Theory of Economics[0x22].[0x29][end]
Hornet: The ship seems okay...[end]
But it's still a bit rough.[end]
Hornet: You should line up soon. He's going to be fussy.[end]
Hornet: We'll leave shortly, just hold on. And stop jumping out![end]
Hornet: Okay! Departure preparations complete! How about you?[end]
Not ready! Let's go![end1]
Hornet: Oh, that's right... I haven't asked about our destination yet. Where is Princess [character][0x1]?[end]
Rush: On the green continent of Campbell!! Right, [character][0x0]?![end]
Truce: Have you forgotten? She's in the fortress on Campbell. We must save her quickly![end]
Hornet: Okay! We'll go over the details later! Let's go! Full speed ahead, [character][0x9]![end]
Hornet: [0x2a]grin[0x2a] I'm a father too, starting today... How embarrassing...[end]
Hornet: I wonder if he's being good... [0x28]Hmph...[0x29][end]
Hornet: If we're going, press the appropriate button![end]
Melodia: [character][0x0]... I can't see! Pick me up![end]
Melodia: I'm tired, [character][0x0]!! Carry me on your back![end]
You meanie![end]
[0x2a]smooch[0x2a][end1]
Thanks, [character][0x0]! You're my favorite![end]
Yippee![end1]
Lukia: [character][0x0]... Today's definitely going to be a rough day.[end]
Lukia: Can you do that for me too? But I guess I'm too heavy, huh.[end]

Frenze and Reeve: We are Lancers.
We attack from far away!
Lan...lan...lancers![end]
Frederica: They're always trying to show off. Geez, that's dangerous...[end]
Frederica: He's always slow and sluggish... Oh no, I'm going to faint...[end]
Frederica: I feel... faint... Ah... [character][0x0]... Please don't worry about me... I'm always like this... But, please... Take this medicine...[end]
Let her drink it Lucky! I'll take it.[end1]
You got 5 Drugs, 5 Heal potions, and 5 Litancibles.[end]
Thank you, I've calmed down a little bit. I should fall asleep soon...[end]
Frederica: The two guys next to me... They stopped talking to each other. They used to be good friends too... Everybody changes... Their hearts... their bodies... They all decay...[end]
Diana: No way![end]
Diana: Hey, have you heard of the Empire's Emperor Sauzer and General Palpaleos?[end]
What about them? I'm not interested.[end1]

They say that they were best friends ever since they were little kids...
While looking at the sky they would talk about their dreams and ambitions.
It's a little different than those two lancers over there...[end]
Diana: Hey, don't you think it's just terrible? I do. Selling your magic power for money... Just because Matelite asks, that suddenly makes it okay... That's low.[end]
Zora: The room in the back is the captain's room. They're having a meeting so you can't go in.[end]

Zora: Nobody's allowed to disturb those two in the captain's room...
Captain Sendak is very delicate and easily hurt so be nice to him![end]
Barclay: Um... This guy Gunso is next to me... The next spot over is open though.[end]
Barclay: Yes... it's often said the Heavy Armor soldiers are carefree.[end]
Barclay: Even with the revival of Kahna the battle continues... Well, that's just the way things go, I guess.[end]

Gunso: [0x2a]scratch[0x2a] [0x2a]scratch[0x2a] I'm Gunso. [0x2a]scratch[0x2a] Turning right, press right... Turning left, press left... Face front, press up... [0x2a]scratch[0x2a] Mahal's training practices have really helped me out.[end]

Gunso: I strained my back... [0x2a]scratch[0x2a]
Yesterday we all had to lift Matelite up... [0x2a]scratch[0x2a] Ouch...[end]
Anastasia: I think he wants us to face forward...[end]
Anastasia: Do you want to talk to the person next to me?[end]
Anastasia: Yesterday's fireworks were thanks to the wizards' magic. Wasn't it beautiful? Do you want to talk to Ectarina too?[end]

Ectarina: Oh...
Uh...
Um...
Hello.[end]
Ectarina: Uh... um... Has he realized that his back is covered with dragon drool yet?[end]
This is Princess [character][0x1]'s room. She'll be really angry, but would you like to see it for a bit?[end]
Crew member: It's so lonely here without Princess [character][0x1]... I've prepared these in advance.[end]

Heheh... She's not in this room. [character][0x1] is taking care of Sendak. You're with us too, [character][0x0]. Me and twelve others... [0x24]Let's just be friends... I will have good memories of you,[0x22] is what she says... All the others are in here doing cleaning. Sort of like, [0x24]Welcome, newlyweds![0x22] Heheh...[end]
When you've been rejected, why don't you try a book or something? Want some?[end]
Dragonkeeper: You have to be friendly with dragons! I'll teach you how to take care of them! Let's go![end]
Matelite: Bwahaha! [character][0x0]! I'll give you one more chance. If you can't do it... I'll have to punish you![end]

Heheh... Okay, how about this!
Turn around![end]
Matelite: Bwahaha! [character][0x0]! It looks like you still don't understand what rules are![end]
I don't know if you're just acting like a leader or what, but you're now in charge of miscellaneous duties! Go study up about things like Formation![end]
Matelite: Taicho! I'm tired, you take over![end]
Taicho: !! You want me... to explain?[end]

Taicho: Oh no... I am not very good with Formation...
Because you can create strong parties with it.[end]
Taicho: [character][0x0]... You know about Formation, do you not?[end]
No, teach me! Yes, I know about it![end1]
[character][0x0]... With Formation, you can compensate for weaknesses in your party![end]
For example, this kind of party...[end]
This party has many Heavy Armor knights who have strong defense, but it makes moving around a nightmare![end]
So bring Lukia, who is a Light Armor knight, with you! That way you can move more quickly![end]
If your Formation consists of people of the same job, their magic and ability effectiveness will increase![end]
When all members are of a different job, their party will have no special strengths![end]
On the other hand, though....[end]
With three Wizards, their Black Magic level will increase![end]
That is all there is to it! I am sure you will figure it out too![end]
Taicho: So, [character][0x0]... Do you understand Formation now?[end]
Oh... I am not very good at teaching... Let us go over it once more...[end]
Good! I get the feeling I have become a little wiser too![end]

???: Wait, that's not all!
There's a very important relationship between Formation and dragons![end]
That's good... You should choose a suitable Formation...[end]
You got a Gunso's ???.[end]
There are some buttons lined up. Which will you press?[end]
Warning!! Take off! Hornet Special![end1]
Hornet: Aren't you forgetting something? You don't mind if I become your godfather, do you?[end]
Matelite: [character][0x0]! Wait! From now on we aren't fighting for the revival of Kahna! The entire world of Orelus is resting on our shoulders now![end]
Taicho: Sir Matelite! Wait![end]
Matelite: Taicho! Give it to General Palpaleos...[end]
Taicho: Sir Matelite! Allow me to...![end]
Matelite: You know what to do, General![end]
Oh!! The Orelus Freedom Force flag![end]
Matelite: It's the battle with the Empire's sky fortress! Let's go![end]
Hornet: Hey! You're... not going to jump out are you?![end]
Hornet: You're going to jump? Oh well, go ahead.[end]
Jump! Don't jump[end1]
Will you wait for Matelite to come out?[end]
Keep wandering around Sit still and wait for Matelite[end1]
You shouldn't wander around too much.[end]
Resistance Rules Meeting in Progress No Entrance!! Matelite[end]
Captain Sendak is resting. Do Not Enter!! Zora[end]
Matelite: How long are you going to wander around! Get in line, on the double![end]

If you make a dragon eat a book or a notebook, it will become smarter. But, you shouldn't overdo it. If that's all you feed them they will start to go mad and become violent.
You should be careful yourslf, [character][0x0][end][end]
